page.title: 02 LOCAL NEWS IN OUR AREA
page.content:
JUNE 4 1985, LED TO A GROUP OF PEOPLE WHO DECIDED TO GATHER MONEY FOR A FAMILY WHOSE DAUGHTER IS AT PRESENT AT GREAT ORMOND ST. HOSPITAL LONDON UNDERGOING A{BONE MARROW TRANSPLANT.} PUBLIC MEETINGS WERE HELD AND A {CAERSWS COMMUNITY CARE FUND}WAS MADE. THE AIM OF THE FUND WAS TO HELP {ANYBODY}IN THE VILLAGE WHO MAY NEED ASSISTANCE. A SUCCESSFUL CAKE STALL WAS HELD ON THE 22ND AND RAISED Â£170, ON THE 27TH A CHAINSTORE SECONDS SALE WAS HELD, TOTAL RAISED NOT KNOWN. IF THE{FUND}IS{NOT}DRAWN UPON WITHIN {10 YEARS}OF THE LAST DONATION PAID OUT,THE TRUSTEE'S WILL WIND THE FUND UP AND ANY MONIES IN IT WILL BE DONATED TO:- {THE BONE MARROW APPEAL FUND.}
**** RHIAN ****
